member.name: T:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.CertificateService
member.summary: The class extracts information from the certificate.

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.iss
member.summary: iss (issuer) claim denoting the party attesting to the claims in the software statement

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.iat
member.summary: iat (issued at) claim

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.exp
member.summary: exp (expiration time) claim MUST NOT be accepted for processing

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.jti
member.summary: jti (JWT ID) claim

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.org_id
member.summary: A unique identifier string assigned by the CDR Register that identifies CDR Participant (e.g. ADR)

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.org_name
member.summary: Human-readable string name of the Accredited Data Recipient to be presented to the end user during authorization.

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.client_name
member.summary: Human-readable string name of the software product to be presented to the end-user during authorization

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.client_description
member.summary: Human-readable string name of the software product description to be presented to the end user during authorization

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.client_uri
member.summary: URL string of a web page providing information about the ADR Software Product

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.redirect_uris
member.summary: Array of redirection URI strings for use in redirect-based flows

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.logo_uri
member.summary: URL string that references a logo for the client. If present, the server SHOULD display this image to the end-user during approval

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.tos_uri
member.summary: URL string that points to a humanreadable terms of service document for the Software Product

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.policy_uri
member.summary: URL string that points to a humanreadable policy document for the Software Product

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.jwks_uri
member.summary: URL string referencing the client's JSON Web Key (JWK) Set [RFC7517] document, which contains the client's public keys

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.revocation_uri
member.summary: URI string that references the location of the Software Product consent revocation endpoint as per https://consumerdatastandardsaustralia.github.io/standards/#end-points

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.recipient_base_uri
member.summary: Base URI for the Consumer Data Standard data recipient endpoints. This should be the base to provide reference to all other Data Recipient Endpoints

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.software_id
member.summary: String representing a unique identifier assigned by the ACCC Register and used by registration endpoints to identify the software product to be dynamically registered

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.software_roles
member.summary: String containing a role of the software in thwe CDR Regime. Initially the only value used with be "data-recipient-software-product"

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.scope
member.summary: String containing a space-separated list of scope values that the client can use when requesting access tokens

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.sector_identifier_uri
member.summary: URL string that references a sector uri for the client. If present, the server SHOULD display this image to the end-user during approval

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.legal_entity_id
member.summary: Human-readable string legal entity id of the Accredited Data Recipient to be presented to the end user during authorization.

member.name: P:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.Models.SoftwareStatementAssertionModel.legal_entity_name
member.summary: Human-readable string legal entity name of the Accredited Data Recipient to be presented to the end user during authorization.

member.name: T:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Business.TokenizerService
member.summary: The class generates a JWT software statement assertion token from data and a certificate.

member.typeparam: The software statement assertion model type.
member.returns: The software statement assertion token as a string.

member.name: M:CDR.Register.SSA.API.Controllers.SSAController.CheckSoftwareProduct(System.String)
member.summary: Performs status check against the softwareProductId parameter
member.returns: An ActionResult if there is an error to return, otherwise null if there are no issues.
